meanings.definition: Lacking an ideal or perfect standard.
meanings.sent1: The painting was idealless, with visible brush strokes and imperfections.
meanings.sent2: Her room was idealless, with mismatched furniture and cluttered shelves.
meanings.sent3: The cake turned out idealless, but it tasted delicious!
meanings.sent4: The garden, though idealless, bloomed with wildflowers and charm.
meanings.sent5: The story had an idealless ending, but it left a lasting impact on the readers.

meanings.definition: Without an ideal or ultimate goal.
meanings.sent1: The journey felt idealless, with no clear destination in sight.
meanings.sent2: His life seemed idealless, without a specific purpose or ambition.
meanings.sent3: The game of tag became idealless when everyone started hiding instead of chasing.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed idealless, meandering aimlessly through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The project appeared idealless at first, but it eventually led to unexpected success.
